title: sergw
author: sergw
content: Hi all,I have 5 years experience in mining, 15 in linux administration.I offer the help with the following topics:- helping with linux administration: {My,P}SQL, PHP, iptables, Apache, Nginx, Git, sed/awk- scripting Python, Bash, Perl, PHP for routins optimization.- VPN: openvpn, wireguard, setup and configuration, help choosing VPS/VM.- Monitoring infrastructure: zabbix, prometheus, grafana- Telegram: bots creation- Mining: helping for novices, networking, monitoring, pools, nodes, etc.- TOR, TON websites: creation, configuration.pm me for details if interested.
